history.text: Hello, What do you think about this movie?
I enjoyed the movie. I enjoy most sports films.
What did you think of the movie?

It sounds like it may be interesting. I haven't seen many Sports films, but I feel like most of them tell a meaningful story. This one looks 
like it has good source material.
It looks like it has mixed ratings though
It was really interesting that it was based on a true story.
Yes, I really enjoy movies based on true stories, so I think I will try this one.
I hope you are not disappointed.
Thanks!
You're welcome!
This additional information has made me more interested in the movie.
It was interesting that Mike was admitted to the school for purely atheletics.
athletics*
That is pretty impressive. As a completely non-athletic person, I am always amazed by people with such talent.
It looks like he found a good mentor though.
A good mentor is important for any student especially one in foster care.
It's amazing that Leigh Anne became his legal guardian and becomes protective over Michael.
Ah, I saw this coming when I read about his friend's mother. I'm glad she took his side though.
And using his instincts towards football is an interesting twist
Yes, she figures out a unique way to get him to use what comes naturally to him.

The Tuohys also seemed to
 value academics.
I'm curious what type of test that was, aside from a career aptitude test.
Yeah, academics are important even for athletes. While you can get far playing, it doesn't make up for every aspect of life
Exactly!
I was glad when Michael chose the Tuohy family over the gang.
Yeah, those situations are never easy, especially with the threat of ciolence
No, it showed that he had a good head on his shoulders even if his academics didn't reflect it.
violence*
Yeah, there is a difference between street smarts and books smarts
I think I'm going to go watch this movie now, as I'm curious about it.
